title: Pompeii and Vesuvius
brief_description: Shows an actual eruption of Mt Vesuvius and against this background recalls the destruction of the city of Pompeii in 79 AD. The film depicts present-day life in the ruined city of Pompeii and life in the cities and villages around Naples, including folk dancing in Sorrento.
